sources.name: CMPLTemp
sources.script:
source(output(
		Complaints_ID as integer,
		CMPLID as string,
		ODINO as string,
		MFR_NAME as string,
		MAKETXT as string,
		MODELTXT as string,
		YEARTXT as string,
		CRASH as string,
		FAILDATE as string,
		FIRE as string,
		INJURED as decimal(18,0),
		DEATHS as decimal(18,0),
		COMPDESC as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		VIN as string,
		DATEA as string,
		LDATE as string,
		MILES as decimal(18,0),
		OCCURENCES as decimal(18,0),
		CDESCR as string,
		CMPL_TYPE as string,
		POLICE_RPT_YN as string,
		PURCH_DT as string,
		ORIG_OWNER_YN as string,
		ANTI_BRAKES_YN as string,
		CRUISE_CONT_YN as string,
		NUM_CYLS as decimal(18,0),
		DRIVE_TRAIN as string,
		FUEL_SYS as string,
		FUEL_TYPE as string,
		TRANS_TYPE as string,
		VEH_SPEED as decimal(18,0),
		DOT as string,
		TIRE_SIZE as string,
		LOC_OF_TIRE as string,
		TIRE_FAIL_TYPE as string,
		ORIG_EQUIP_YN as string,
		MANUF_DT as string,
		SEAT_TYPE as string,
		RESTRAINT_TYE as string,
		DEALER_NAME as string,
		DEALER_TEL as string,
		DEALER_CITY as string,
		DEALER_STATE as string,
		DEALER_ZIP as string,
		PROD_TYPE as string,
		REPAIRED_YN as string,
		MEDICAL_ATTN as string,
		VEHICLES_TOWED_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> CMPLTemp

sources.name: Complaints
sources.script:
source(output(
		Complaints_ID as integer,
		CMPLID as string,
		ODINO as string,
		MFR_NAME as string,
		MAKETXT as string,
		MODELTXT as string,
		YEARTXT as string,
		CRASH as string,
		FAILDATE as string,
		FIRE as string,
		INJURED as decimal(18,0),
		DEATHS as decimal(18,0),
		COMPDESC as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		VIN as string,
		DATEA as string,
		LDATE as string,
		MILES as decimal(18,0),
		OCCURENCES as decimal(18,0),
		CDESCR as string,
		CMPL_TYPE as string,
		POLICE_RPT_YN as string,
		PURCH_DT as string,
		ORIG_OWNER_YN as string,
		ANTI_BRAKES_YN as string,
		CRUISE_CONT_YN as string,
		NUM_CYLS as decimal(18,0),
		DRIVE_TRAIN as string,
		FUEL_SYS as string,
		FUEL_TYPE as string,
		TRANS_TYPE as string,
		VEH_SPEED as decimal(18,0),
		DOT as string,
		TIRE_SIZE as string,
		LOC_OF_TIRE as string,
		TIRE_FAIL_TYPE as string,
		ORIG_EQUIP_YN as string,
		MANUF_DT as string,
		SEAT_TYPE as string,
		RESTRAINT_TYE as string,
		DEALER_NAME as string,
		DEALER_TEL as string,
		DEALER_CITY as string,
		DEALER_STATE as string,
		DEALER_ZIP as string,
		PROD_TYPE as string,
		REPAIRED_YN as string,
		MEDICAL_ATTN as string,
		VEHICLES_TOWED_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'table') ~> Complaints

sinks.name: destComplaints
sinks.script:
Union1 sink(input(
		Complaints_ID as integer,
		CMPLID as string,
		ODINO as string,
		MFR_NAME as string,
		MAKETXT as string,
		MODELTXT as string,
		YEARTXT as string,
		CRASH as string,
		FAILDATE as string,
		FIRE as string,
		INJURED as decimal(18,0),
		DEATHS as decimal(18,0),
		COMPDESC as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		VIN as string,
		DATEA as string,
		LDATE as string,
		MILES as decimal(18,0),
		OCCURENCES as decimal(18,0),
		CDESCR as string,
		CMPL_TYPE as string,
		POLICE_RPT_YN as string,
		PURCH_DT as string,
		ORIG_OWNER_YN as string,
		ANTI_BRAKES_YN as string,
		CRUISE_CONT_YN as string,
		NUM_CYLS as decimal(18,0),
		DRIVE_TRAIN as string,
		FUEL_SYS as string,
		FUEL_TYPE as string,
		TRANS_TYPE as string,
		VEH_SPEED as decimal(18,0),
		DOT as string,
		TIRE_SIZE as string,
		LOC_OF_TIRE as string,
		TIRE_FAIL_TYPE as string,
		ORIG_EQUIP_YN as string,
		MANUF_DT as string,
		SEAT_TYPE as string,
		RESTRAINT_TYE as string,
		DEALER_NAME as string,
		DEALER_TEL as string,
		DEALER_CITY as string,
		DEALER_STATE as string,
		DEALER_ZIP as string,
		PROD_TYPE as string,
		REPAIRED_YN as string,
		MEDICAL_ATTN as string,
		VEHICLES_TOWED_YN as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		CMPLID,
		ODINO,
		MFR_NAME,
		MAKETXT,
		MODELTXT,
		YEARTXT,
		CRASH,
		FAILDATE,
		FIRE,
		INJURED,
		DEATHS,
		COMPDESC,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		VIN,
		DATEA,
		LDATE,
		MILES,
		OCCURENCES,
		CDESCR,
		CMPL_TYPE,
		POLICE_RPT_YN,
		PURCH_DT,
		ORIG_OWNER_YN,
		ANTI_BRAKES_YN,
		CRUISE_CONT_YN,
		NUM_CYLS,
		DRIVE_TRAIN,
		FUEL_SYS,
		FUEL_TYPE,
		TRANS_TYPE,
		VEH_SPEED,
		DOT,
		TIRE_SIZE,
		LOC_OF_TIRE,
		TIRE_FAIL_TYPE,
		ORIG_EQUIP_YN,
		MANUF_DT,
		SEAT_TYPE,
		RESTRAINT_TYE,
		DEALER_NAME,
		DEALER_TEL,
		DEALER_CITY,
		DEALER_STATE,
		DEALER_ZIP,
		PROD_TYPE,
		REPAIRED_YN,
		MEDICAL_ATTN,
		VEHICLES_TOWED_YN
	),
	truncate:true) ~> destComplaints

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		CMPLID,
		ODINO,
		MFR_NAME,
		MAKETXT,
		MODELTXT,
		YEARTXT,
		CRASH,
		FAILDATE,
		FIRE,
		INJURED,
		DEATHS,
		COMPDESC,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		VIN,
		DATEA,
		LDATE,
		MILES,
		OCCURENCES,
		CDESCR,
		CMPL_TYPE,
		POLICE_RPT_YN,
		PURCH_DT,
		ORIG_OWNER_YN,
		ANTI_BRAKES_YN,
		CRUISE_CONT_YN,
		NUM_CYLS,
		DRIVE_TRAIN,
		FUEL_SYS,
		FUEL_TYPE,
		TRANS_TYPE,
		VEH_SPEED,
		DOT,
		TIRE_SIZE,
		LOC_OF_TIRE,
		TIRE_FAIL_TYPE,
		ORIG_EQUIP_YN,
		MANUF_DT,
		SEAT_TYPE,
		RESTRAINT_TYE,
		DEALER_NAME,
		DEALER_TEL,
		DEALER_CITY,
		DEALER_STATE,
		DEALER_ZIP,
		PROD_TYPE,
		REPAIRED_YN,
		MEDICAL_ATTN,
		VEHICLES_TOWED_YN
	))~> Select1
